name: Jupyter Notebook Dark (originally from Ipython)
description:
Originally this stylish sheet is Ipython Notebook Dark

The default highlight syntax is gvim desert. Enjoy customizing your own color theme ;)

If there are some problems about your own color theme, check out the ending part of the stylish sheet, also if you want to change the output area color theme.

discussions.name: Could you tone down markdown code excerpts
